alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Johnson; Menifee; Morgan; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:53PM EDT until June 17 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Eastern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... Elliott County in east central Kentucky... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 1253 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Head of Grassy to Big Woods, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Zag around 100 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
